PROJECTS.raw:
location: gurgaon
merlot
the merlot program is designed to train and teach an artificially intelligent classifier. with the adequate training
data, the classifier learns to categorize the product offers into a predefined product ontology.
as a analyst, my role was to provide the classifier with the training data by extensive research about the product
catalogues uploaded by merchants participating in google shopping and maintaining the quality dashboard as qa.
responsibilities: to research on product categories. analyze and audit the judgments offered by other labels. optimize existing process and provide feedback on tools & methodologies used. part of meeting with client & resolve the conflicts and ambiguous categories.
